content: I am curious if anyone is aligning the Primary, Secondary, etc Diagnosis (using PriorityCode) when they create Encounters that have entryRelationship Diagnoses (observations)?

not directly related to C-CDA: In Germany we use entryRelationship between primary and secondary, but I donâ€™t see PriorityCode in our IG.

http://wiki.hl7.de/index.php?title=IG:HL7_diagnosis

I feel that PriorityCode would address the sequence if there are more than one primary (or secondary) diagnoses.
